name: Vanwyrm Cryst

ability.name: Aerial Marauder
ability.description: Can be ridden as a flying mount. Increases damage player deals to enemy weak points while mounted.

description: The Melodies of a flute made from the exoskeleton of a Vanwyrm Cryst are said to cross whole mountain ranges. In ages past, such flutes were used to signal victory in a battle.

skills.name: Air Cannon
skills.description: Quickly fires a burst of highly pressurized air.

skills.name: Ice Missile
skills.description: Creates ice lances in the air that fly towards enemies.

skills.name: Icicle Cutter
skills.description: Creates a crescent blade of ice and hurls it forward.

skills.name: Cryst Breath
skills.description: Enshrouds an enemy in a frigid blast of air, dealing continuous damage.

skills.name: Nightmare Ball
skills.description: Creates a giant ball of darkness and hurls it at an enemy.

skills.name: Blizzard Spike
skills.description: Creates a giant lump of ice and hurls it at an enemy. It deals damage to those in the surrounding area upon impact.

skills.name: Dark Laser
skills.description: Charges dark energy before blasting enemies with a powerful beam.
